#summary Subs Downloader installation procedure v0.12.
#labels installation

= Introduction =

This manula will perform You through Subtitle Downloader installation proces


= Details =

1) Copy enigma2-plugin-extensions-subsdownloader_ _VERSION_ _mipsel.ipk file via ftp (or other mechanism) to Your sat receiver.<br>
_I prefer /tmp directory so this manual will show You installation for this case._
<br>
2) Change directory to TPM:<br>
_root@DM8000:cd /tmp_<br>
3) Install IPK file:<br>
_root@DM8000:opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-subsdownloader_ _VERSION_ _mipsel.ipk_<br>

You should see telnet respond as below:<br>

http://subs-downloader.googlecode.com/svn/files/pictures/wiki/installation/installation_telnet.JPG
